trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit Train
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit Train

trans-unit.source: Trains a model from the Vowpal Wabbit machine learning system
trans-unit.target: Trains a model from the Vowpal Wabbit machine learning system

trans-unit.source: Category: <link xlink:href="c790e4eb-2aae-4228-a12f-69809b9e70ae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Text Analytics</link>
trans-unit.target: Category: <link xlink:href="c790e4eb-2aae-4228-a12f-69809b9e70ae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Text Analytics</link>

trans-unit.source: Module Overview
trans-unit.target: Module Overview

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module to create a machine learning model using the Vowpal Wabbit machine learning framework.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module to create a machine learning model using the Vowpal Wabbit machine learning framework.

trans-unit.source: This module calls an instance of Vowpal Wabbit that is hosted in the Azure workspace.
trans-unit.target: This module calls an instance of Vowpal Wabbit that is hosted in the Azure workspace.

trans-unit.source: You then train the model using data hosted in Azure storage.
trans-unit.target: You then train the model using data hosted in Azure storage.

trans-unit.source: The model is saved in Azure storage but is serialized back to the workspace so that you can later use it to score data, using <link xlink:href="6a8e06c3-851b-49c0-b350-a6af93755f31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Score VW</link>.
trans-unit.target: The model is saved in Azure storage but is serialized back to the workspace so that you can later use it to score data, using <link xlink:href="6a8e06c3-851b-49c0-b350-a6af93755f31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Score VW</link>.

trans-unit.source: The <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module provides an additional input port where you can connect an existing trained model, to train the model incrementally.
trans-unit.target: The <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module provides an additional input port where you can connect an existing trained model, to train the model incrementally.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could train a model on a starter dataset, and then connect the trained model to a new <ui>Vowal Wabbit Train</ui> module to update and refresh the model with new data.
trans-unit.target: For example, you could train a model on a starter dataset, and then connect the trained model to a new <ui>Vowal Wabbit Train</ui> module to update and refresh the model with new data.

trans-unit.source: What is Vowpal Wabbit?
trans-unit.target: What is Vowpal Wabbit?

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit is a fast, parallel machine learning framework that was developed for distributed computing by Yahoo!
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit is a fast, parallel machine learning framework that was developed for distributed computing by Yahoo!

trans-unit.source: Research.
trans-unit.target: Research.

trans-unit.source: Later it was ported to Windows and adapted by John Langford (Microsoft Research) for scientific computing in parallel architectures.
trans-unit.target: Later it was ported to Windows and adapted by John Langford (Microsoft Research) for scientific computing in parallel architectures.

trans-unit.source: Features of Vowpal Wabbit that are important for machine learning include continuous learning (online learning), dimensionality reduction, and interactive learning.
trans-unit.target: Features of Vowpal Wabbit that are important for machine learning include continuous learning (online learning), dimensionality reduction, and interactive learning.

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit is also a solution for problems when you cannot fit the model data into memory.
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit is also a solution for problems when you cannot fit the model data into memory.

trans-unit.source: How to Use Vowpal Wabbit Train
trans-unit.target: How to Use Vowpal Wabbit Train

trans-unit.source: To train a new Vowpal Wabbit model
trans-unit.target: To train a new Vowpal Wabbit model

trans-unit.source: Specify the location of the training data in Azure storage, and the credentials for accessing the files.
trans-unit.target: Specify the location of the training data in Azure storage, and the credentials for accessing the files.

trans-unit.source: See the <legacyLink xlink:href="#bkmk_Options" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Options</legacyLink> section for details.
trans-unit.target: See the <legacyLink xlink:href="#bkmk_Options" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Options</legacyLink> section for details.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can specify command-line arguments that will be passed to the Vowpal Wabbit executable, by using the <ui>VW arguments</ui> property of the module.
trans-unit.target: Optionally, you can specify command-line arguments that will be passed to the Vowpal Wabbit executable, by using the <ui>VW arguments</ui> property of the module.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might add <legacyItalic><userInput>–l</userInput></legacyItalic> to specify the learning rate, or <legacyItalic><userInput>-b</userInput></legacyItalic> to indicate the number of hashing bits.
trans-unit.target: For example, you might add <legacyItalic><userInput>–l</userInput></legacyItalic> to specify the learning rate, or <legacyItalic><userInput>-b</userInput></legacyItalic> to indicate the number of hashing bits.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <legacyLink xlink:href="#bkmk_Options" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Options</legacyLink> section.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the <legacyLink xlink:href="#bkmk_Options" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Options</legacyLink> section.

trans-unit.source: Specify the file name and format of the input dataset.
trans-unit.target: Specify the file name and format of the input dataset.

trans-unit.source: The input dataset must consist of a single text column in either of the two supported formats: LibSVM or VW.
trans-unit.target: The input dataset must consist of a single text column in either of the two supported formats: LibSVM or VW.

trans-unit.source: If you use the Vowpal Wabbit internal format, you must prepare the data outside of Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: If you use the Vowpal Wabbit internal format, you must prepare the data outside of Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: If you use the SVMLight format, you can create the data from any dataset by using the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module.
trans-unit.target: If you use the SVMLight format, you can create the data from any dataset by using the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module does not support saving files to Azure storage using the SVMLight format; however, you can generate the correct format using the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module, save the file locally, and then upload it using another Azure storage utility.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module does not support saving files to Azure storage using the SVMLight format; however, you can generate the correct format using the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module, save the file locally, and then upload it using another Azure storage utility.

trans-unit.source: Provide a name for saving the trained model, and a name for saving the hash file associated with the model.
trans-unit.target: Provide a name for saving the trained model, and a name for saving the hash file associated with the model.

trans-unit.source: The trained model and hash file must be stored in the same storage account and container as the data used to train the model.
trans-unit.target: The trained model and hash file must be stored in the same storage account and container as the data used to train the model.

trans-unit.source: Run the experiment.
trans-unit.target: Run the experiment.

trans-unit.source: After the model has been generated, you can right-click the output of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> and select <ui>Save as trained model</ui>, to re-use and re-train the model later.
trans-unit.target: After the model has been generated, you can right-click the output of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> and select <ui>Save as trained model</ui>, to re-use and re-train the model later.

trans-unit.source: To retrain an existing Vowpal Wabbit model
trans-unit.target: To retrain an existing Vowpal Wabbit model

trans-unit.source: Add the <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module to your experiment.
trans-unit.target: Add the <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui> module to your experiment.

trans-unit.source: Connect a previously trained model to the input port of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>:
trans-unit.target: Connect a previously trained model to the input port of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>:

trans-unit.source: Use the output of another <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>module in the same experiment.
trans-unit.target: Use the output of another <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>module in the same experiment.

trans-unit.source: Locate a saved model in the <ui>Trained Models</ui> group of Studio’s left navigation pane.
trans-unit.target: Locate a saved model in the <ui>Trained Models</ui> group of Studio’s left navigation pane.

trans-unit.source: Only Vowpal Wabbit models are supported; you cannot connect saved models that were trained by using other algorithms.
trans-unit.target: Only Vowpal Wabbit models are supported; you cannot connect saved models that were trained by using other algorithms.

trans-unit.source: During retraining, the same arguments must be used in the command line, but you can have different values.
trans-unit.target: During retraining, the same arguments must be used in the command line, but you can have different values.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might retrain the model using a lower learning rate.
trans-unit.target: For example, you might retrain the model using a lower learning rate.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Properties</ui> pane of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>, specify the location and format of the training data, as described in the previous steps.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Properties</ui> pane of <ui>Vowpal Wabbit Train</ui>, specify the location and format of the training data, as described in the previous steps.

trans-unit.source: Provide the location for saving the updated model, and a name for saving the human-readable model output file and the hash file associated with the updated model.
trans-unit.target: Provide the location for saving the updated model, and a name for saving the human-readable model output file and the hash file associated with the updated model.

trans-unit.source: Run the experiment.
trans-unit.target: Run the experiment.

trans-unit.source: If there is an existing file Vowpal Wabbit model or hash file in that location, it will be silently overwritten by the new trained model.
trans-unit.target: If there is an existing file Vowpal Wabbit model or hash file in that location, it will be silently overwritten by the new trained model.

trans-unit.source: To preserve intermediate models when retraining, you must change the storage location or make a local copy of the model files.
trans-unit.target: To preserve intermediate models when retraining, you must change the storage location or make a local copy of the model files.

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: Options

trans-unit.source: You can use the following parameters to customize the source of the data and where to save the trained model.
trans-unit.target: You can use the following parameters to customize the source of the data and where to save the trained model.

trans-unit.source: Azure storage account name
trans-unit.target: Azure storage account name

trans-unit.source: Type the name of the account where you want to store the trained model.
trans-unit.target: Type the name of the account where you want to store the trained model.

trans-unit.source: The data used to train the model should be available in this same storage account, unless you are using a previously trained model.
trans-unit.target: The data used to train the model should be available in this same storage account, unless you are using a previously trained model.

trans-unit.source: Azure storage key
trans-unit.target: Azure storage key

trans-unit.source: Copy and paste the key that is provided for accessing the storage account
trans-unit.target: Copy and paste the key that is provided for accessing the storage account

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have a key, see <externalLink><linkText>How to regenerate storage access keys</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/storage-manage-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have a key, see <externalLink><linkText>How to regenerate storage access keys</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/storage-manage-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: Azure container name
trans-unit.target: Azure container name

trans-unit.source: Type the container name without the account name or protocol prefix.
trans-unit.target: Type the container name without the account name or protocol prefix.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the full container path and name is <userInputLocalizable>https://myaccount.blob.core.windows.net/vwmodel</userInputLocalizable>, you should type just <userInputLocalizable>vwmodel</userInputLocalizable>.
trans-unit.target: For example, if the full container path and name is <userInputLocalizable>https://myaccount.blob.core.windows.net/vwmodel</userInputLocalizable>, you should type just <userInputLocalizable>vwmodel</userInputLocalizable>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about container names, see <externalLink><linkText>Naming and Referencing Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dd135715.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about container names, see <externalLink><linkText>Naming and Referencing Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dd135715.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: VW arguments
trans-unit.target: VW arguments

trans-unit.source: Type a set of valid command-line arguments to the Vowpal Wabbit executable.
trans-unit.target: Type a set of valid command-line arguments to the Vowpal Wabbit executable.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Not supported</legacyBold>: You cannot use the following command-line arguments in Azure machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Not supported</legacyBold>: You cannot use the following command-line arguments in Azure machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: The input/output options specified in <externalLink><linkText>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: The input/output options specified in <externalLink><linkText>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: These properties are already configured automatically by the module.
trans-unit.target: These properties are already configured automatically by the module.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, any option that generates multiple outputs or takes multiple inputs is disallowed.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, any option that generates multiple outputs or takes multiple inputs is disallowed.

trans-unit.source: These include <legacyItalic><userInput>--cbt</userInput></legacyItalic>, <legacyItalic><userInput>--lda</userInput></legacyItalic>, and <legacyItalic><userInput>--wap</userInput></legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: These include <legacyItalic><userInput>--cbt</userInput></legacyItalic>, <legacyItalic><userInput>--lda</userInput></legacyItalic>, and <legacyItalic><userInput>--wap</userInput></legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Only supervised learning algorithms are supported.
trans-unit.target: Only supervised learning algorithms are supported.

trans-unit.source: This disallows these options: <legacyItalic><userInput>–active</userInput></legacyItalic>, <userInput>--rank</userInput>, <legacyItalic><userInput>--search</userInput></legacyItalic> etc.
trans-unit.target: This disallows these options: <legacyItalic><userInput>–active</userInput></legacyItalic>, <userInput>--rank</userInput>, <legacyItalic><userInput>--search</userInput></legacyItalic> etc.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Supported</legacyBold>: All arguments other than those described above are allowed.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Supported</legacyBold>: All arguments other than those described above are allowed.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of arguments, use the <externalLink><linkText>Vowpal Wabbit wiki page</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of arguments, use the <externalLink><linkText>Vowpal Wabbit wiki page</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Command-line-arguments</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Name of the input VW file
trans-unit.target: Name of the input VW file

trans-unit.source: Type the name of the file that contains the input data.
trans-unit.target: Type the name of the file that contains the input data.

trans-unit.source: The file must be located in the previously specified storage account and container, and must be in either of the two supported formats.
trans-unit.target: The file must be located in the previously specified storage account and container, and must be in either of the two supported formats.

trans-unit.source: Please specify file type
trans-unit.target: Please specify file type

trans-unit.source: Choose one of the two input file formats supported by Vowpal Wabbit:
trans-unit.target: Choose one of the two input file formats supported by Vowpal Wabbit:

trans-unit.source: <legacyItalic><ui>VW</ui></legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyItalic><ui>VW</ui></legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit internal format
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit internal format

trans-unit.source: See the <externalLink><linkText>Vowpal Wabbit wiki page</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Input-format</linkUri></externalLink> for details of the internal file format.
trans-unit.target: See the <externalLink><linkText>Vowpal Wabbit wiki page</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/Input-format</linkUri></externalLink> for details of the internal file format.

trans-unit.source: The Vowpal Wabbit data format has the advantage that it does not require a columnar format, which saves space when dealing with sparse data.
trans-unit.target: The Vowpal Wabbit data format has the advantage that it does not require a columnar format, which saves space when dealing with sparse data.

trans-unit.source: <legacyItalic><ui>SVMLight</ui></legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyItalic><ui>SVMLight</ui></legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module to convert your data to this format.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <link xlink:href="8d44b923-97df-4dd5-a6d4-173bb89c7441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert to SVMLight</link> module to convert your data to this format.

trans-unit.source: Name of the output readable model (--readable_model) file
trans-unit.target: Name of the output readable model (--readable_model) file

trans-unit.source: Type the name of the file to save the model in.
trans-unit.target: Type the name of the file to save the model in.

trans-unit.source: The file is saved within the same storage account and container as the input file.
trans-unit.target: The file is saved within the same storage account and container as the input file.

trans-unit.source: Name of the output inverted hash (--invert_hash) file
trans-unit.target: Name of the output inverted hash (--invert_hash) file

trans-unit.source: Type the name of the file to save the hash file created when training the model.
trans-unit.target: Type the name of the file to save the hash file created when training the model.

trans-unit.source: The file is saved within the same storage account and container as the input file.
trans-unit.target: The file is saved within the same storage account and container as the input file.

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: Currently there are no examples of this machine learning algorithm in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink> because this module requires authentication to an Azure storage account.
trans-unit.target: Currently there are no examples of this machine learning algorithm in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink> because this module requires authentication to an Azure storage account.

trans-unit.source: We encourage you to review published community samples to see applications for the Vowpal Wabbit libraries.
trans-unit.target: We encourage you to review published community samples to see applications for the Vowpal Wabbit libraries.

trans-unit.source: Technical Notes
trans-unit.target: Technical Notes

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit provides extremely fast learning over non-linear features like n-grams.
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit provides extremely fast learning over non-linear features like n-grams.

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit uses <newTerm>online learning</newTerm> techniques such as stochastic gradient descent (SGD) to fit a model one record at a time.
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit uses <newTerm>online learning</newTerm> techniques such as stochastic gradient descent (SGD) to fit a model one record at a time.

trans-unit.source: Thus it iterates very quickly over raw data and can develop a good predictor faster than most other models.
trans-unit.target: Thus it iterates very quickly over raw data and can develop a good predictor faster than most other models.

trans-unit.source: This approach also avoids having to read all training data into memory.
trans-unit.target: This approach also avoids having to read all training data into memory.

trans-unit.source: Vowpal Wabbit converts all data to hashes, not just text data but other categorical variables.
trans-unit.target: Vowpal Wabbit converts all data to hashes, not just text data but other categorical variables.

trans-unit.source: Using hashes makes lookups of regression weights more efficient, which is critical for effective stochastic gradient descent.
trans-unit.target: Using hashes makes lookups of regression weights more efficient, which is critical for effective stochastic gradient descent.

trans-unit.source: The version of Vowpal Wabbit hosted in Azure Machine Learning is Version 7.4.0.
trans-unit.target: The version of Vowpal Wabbit hosted in Azure Machine Learning is Version 7.4.0.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more specified columns of data set couldn't be found.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more specified columns of data set couldn't be found.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if parameter is less than or equal to specific value.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if parameter is less than or equal to specific value.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more specified columns have type unsupported by current module.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more specified columns have type unsupported by current module.
